name: Saturn Power No. 2
overview: Gremlin Interactive Demo Disc is a demo disc released in PAL regions for upcoming Sega Saturn titles by Gremlin Interactive. It should not be confused with the awkwardly titled Gremlin Interactive Demo Disk, which was released earlier and features different games. This disc was bundled with issue #58 of Mega Force in France. It was also distributed with UK magazine Saturn Power, being retitled Saturn Power No. 2. The disc contains three demos, consisting of Actua Soccer: Club Edition, Hardcore 4x4 and perhaps most significantly, the unreleased Saturn port of Re-Loaded.
